Name: eula_checkbox
English: I agree to the terms of the End User License Agreement.

Name: age_verification_question
English: You must be 13 years of age or older to download a book from the collection.\nHow old are you?

Name: age_verification_changed
English: If you are under 13, all content downloaded to My Books will be removed.\nHow old are you?

Name: age_verification_13_checkbox
English: I am 13 years of age or older.

Name: age_verification_too_young
English: You are not old enough to sign up for a library card.

Name: holds_empty
English: When you reserve a book from the catalog it will show up here. Look here from time to time to see if your book is available to download.

Name: catalog_load_error_text
English: An error occurred while loading the catalog. Please try again.

Name: catalog_load_not_connected
English: You are not connected to the internet. Please connect and try again.

Name: catalog_book_revoke_loan_confirm
English: Are you sure you want to return this book?

Name: catalog_book_revoke_hold_confirm
English: Are you sure you want to remove this reservation?

Name: catalog_book_delete_confirm
English: Are you sure you want to remove this book from My Books?

Name: catalog_revoke_failed
English: The operation could not be completed.

Name: catalog_download_failed
English: The download could not be completed.

Name: catalog_download_failed_too_many_activations
English: The download could not be completed. Adobe device activations reached.

Name: catalog_download_failed_account_not_active
English: This device has not been activated. Go to account settings to activate.

Name: catalog_download_failed_unsupported_pdf
English: This book is an Adobe PDF, which is not supported.

Name: catalog_download_failed_unsupported_unknown
English: This book is of an unknown type and is not supported.

Name: catalog_download_failed_unsupported_passhash
English: Passhash protected books are not supported.

Name: catalog_empty_my_books
English: Visit the Catalog to\nadd books to My Books.

Name: catalog_meta_corrupt
English: The metadata for this book is damaged! Please sync your account to fix it.

Name: catalog_added_for_later_download
English: Added to My Books for downloading later.

Name: catalog_book_availability_loaned_indefinite
English: You have this book on loan.

Name: catalog_book_availability_loaned_timed
English: You have this book on loan for %s.

Name: catalog_book_availability_open_access
English: This book is yours to keep.

Name: catalog_book_availability_held_indefinite
English: You have this book on hold.

Name: catalog_book_availability_held_timed
English: You will be able to borrow this book in %s.

Name: catalog_book_availability_held_queue
English: You are at position %d in the queue for this book.

Name: catalog_book_availability_loanable
English: This book is available for loan.

Name: catalog_book_availability_holdable
English: All copies of this book are currently on loan.

Name: catalog_book_availability_revoked
English: This book is waiting to be returned.

Name: library_signup_title
English: Sign Up for a Library Card

Name: settings_screen_Lock_not_setup
English: "Secure lock screen hasn't been set up. Go to 'Settings -> Security -> Screenlock' to set up a lock screen"

Name: settings_login_failed_credentials
English: Your barcode and pin combination was not valid. Please try again.

Name: settings_login_failed_server
English: An unknown error occurred. Please check your connection or try again later.

Name: settings_logout_failed_server
English: An unknown error occurred. Please check your connection or try again later.

Name: settings_login_failed_device
English: An error occurred when activating your device. Please check your connection or try again later.

Name: settings_login_failed_adobe_device_limit
English: Too many devices have been registered on this account. Please contact Adobe support for assistance.

Name: settings_login_failed_adobe_device_bad_clock
English: An error occurred when activating your device. Please check that your device clock is set to the correct time.

Name: settings_logout_confirm
English: If you sign out of your account, all content will be removed from this device.

Name: login_needed
English: You need to login to access the collection.

Name: reader_error_book_database
English: There was a problem with the book database.

Name: reader_error_account_database
English: There was a problem with the accounts database.

Name: reader_error_epub_error
English: The given EPUB file could not be loaded.

Name: reader_error_epub_missing
English: The given EPUB file appears to be missing and therefore cannot be loaded.

Name: reader_error_general
English: An error occurred whilst trying to set up the reader.

Name: reader_accessibility_toc_back
English: Close the table of contents without selecting an item

Name: reader_accessibility_media_play
English: Play or pause current media item

Name: welcome_library_subtext
English: Simply browse, borrow, and read free e-books from your local library.

Name: welcome_instant_subtext
English: E-books free to download and read without a library card.

Name: profiles_select
English: Please select an existing profile or create a new one.

Name: profiles_please_enter
English: Please enter your name, gender, and date of birth.

Name: profiles_selection_error_general
English: An error occurred whilst trying to select your profile.

Name: profiles_creation_error_name_already_used
English: That name has already been used. Please pick another.

Name: profiles_creation_error_general
English: An error occurred whilst trying to create your profile.

Name: profiles_account_selection_error_general
English: An error occurred whilst trying to select an account.

Name: profiles_account_creation_error_general
English: An error occurred whilst trying to create the account.

Name: profiles_account_deletion_error_general
English: An error occurred whilst trying to delete the account.

Name: profiles_switch_confirm
English: Are you sure you want to switch profiles?

Name: profiles_delete_confirm
English: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?

Name: profiles_time_out_soon
English: The current profile will soon be logged out due to inactivity. Please touch the screen if you want to stay logged in.

Name: profiles_deletion_error
English: An error occurred whilst trying to delete the profile.

Name: profiles_ask_birth
English: What is your date of birth?

Name: profiles_ask_pilot_school
English: Is your school in an eLibrary pilot program?
